page.title: 20SCENERY AROUND CONSETT
page.content: and moorhens.River banks,often tree- lined,have ragged robin,hearts'ease, comfrey,St.Johnswort,red campion and early purple orchid with marsh marigold,water mint and mimulus in damper places.Natural pasture has, besides commoner plants,colourful meadow cromesbill,cornflower, speedwell,red clover alongside plainer plantains,sedges,quaking and fescue grasses.Butterflies include orange tip,painted lady,red admiral and peacock.Hedgerows,a rich source of vegetation,where coltsfoot,celandine, herb Robert,red and yellow poppies, sweet cicely,and knapweeds persist against invading cow parsely,nettles and hogweed.Often plants are emeshed in clinging vetches,bindweed,and cleavers.Roe deer,rabbits,field mice, voles,red squirrels,badgers,stoats and weasels share land with frogs,toads.
